globalHeaders.Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; img-src 'self' data:; font-src 'self' data:; connect-src 'self'; frame-ancestors 'none'; base-uri 'self'; form-action 'self'

_comments.reason: Next.js SSR build has no generated index.html; platform runtime handles route resolution. Removed SPA-style index.html rewrites.
_comments.static_export_option: If you later use `next export` (adding output: 'export' in next.config and producing /index.html), reintroduce a navigationFallback rewriting to /index.html.
